name: Monarchy
content: The Creative, Marketing and Strategy Engine of the group. Monarchy's team oversees the gorwth of our brands, helping our CEOs achieve breakthroughs in business models.

name: Serendipity
content: Our film production company launching the new Series Women of the Movement on ABC January 2022. Do you have a great idea? Reach out to our creative team.

name: Tenute di Donna
content: Wine is an Art and ours is true poetry. Tenute Di Donna will bring you the intense flavor of the Primitivo di Puglia (Italy) one of the best wines in the world. A wine Intense, romantic, passioante and in love. An experience in itself.

name: AdyProduction
content: Scaling businesses quicly to 7 figures and beyond. Our proven apporach helps CEOs and Executive teams to grow their businesses quickly and steadly. See if you qualify to enter our acceleration group.

name: DMZ
content: Our top level Accounting, financial and tax management team located in Italy. With over 600 Customers, we have one of the most effectice professionals equipe on the market. If you are located in Italy our group is the best you can dream of.

name: Viva Concepts
content: Viva Concepts is the top referral marketing firm in the US for Dental Practices. Our technology and program helps dental offices to add $500,000 to $1,000,000 in 12 months or less. Are you a dental practice? You need to get in touch with us.

name: Sales Jet
content: We needed a marketing tool to run our campaigns and projects, so we built one. SalesJet is built by entrepreneurs for entrepreneurs. Want to learn more on how to use our marketing platform?

name: Body Contourz
content: The most effective weight loss technology and program. We have just launched our franchising with 2 centers in Los Angeles, 1 in Atlanta and 1 in Tampa (opening soon). We guarantee results in the first session, you loose 2 inches of fat or your money back guaranteed.

name: Upliffs
content: Our Fitness and lifestile brand. Because you need to have fun as well. I love this brand as my wife launched out of a wim during the pandemic. She couldn't find good home fitness equipment, so she decided to build a company around it.

name: ANDA
content: Started during the pandemic to support entrepreneurs, our Facebook Show reached thousands of entrepreneurs. We interviewed 127 top business owners and CEOs. New season launching soon
